text:
I was hoping to put them in my showreel as I don't feel as if I have enough work to show my skills in body mechanic or lipsyncing.

Also, that's a really good point! I enjoy drawing and reading comics so I could centre an animation piece around that. I also enjoy baking, karaoke and musical theatre! There's actually a lot of different scenarios I could do with these hobbies :smile: thank you for the suggestion! I will let you know once I start planning a short piece centered around one of these hobbies
I have a question about becoming a senior animator - how long is an animator expected to be a junior animator before they can apply for a position as senior animator?
